程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature

package com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature
  • 接口概要
    接口
    说明
    Alive
    The Alive interface means the ability for Creature to jump,die and shoot projectile
  • 类概要
    类
    说明
    Boss
    The com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Boss is a special Enemy.
    Creature
    The Creature class extends UpdatableObject, which implements Alive interface.
    Enemy
    A Enemy is a non-controllable GameObject that kills the Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.
    Hero
    Hero is a GameObject that is controllable by the player.
